Name: Aloizio Macedo
AboutMe:
I am a graduate student at UFRJ (Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro).

My current area is Geometry and Topology. Specifically, I'm studying the free loop space of globally symmetric spaces and its homology in the specific case of CROSS's (Compact Rank One Symmetric Spaces).

My main interests reside in the following areas:

  • Geometry
  • Topology
  • Analysis
  • Set Theory
  • Foundations of Mathematics
  • Algebra
  • Functional Analysis
  • Measure Theory

I also like music, and I'm a huge fan of guitarist John Frusciante.

I have a blog, on which I post something every once in a millennium: http://aloiziomacedo.weebly.com/

You can contact me at aloiziomacedo AT gmail DOT com.
